subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Tyson Fury defeated Wladimir Klitschko by unanimous decision on Saturday in Düsseldorf, Germany, to end Klitschko’s nine-and-a-half-year reign as heavyweight champion.
snippet: Tyson Fury defeated Wladimir Klitschko by unanimous decision on Saturday in Düsseldorf, Germany, to end Klitschko’s nine-and-a-half-year reign as heavyweight champion.
